duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform plumbing services for clients in a timely and professional manner.
Troubleshoot and diagnose plumbing issues to provide effective solutions.
Install and repair plumbing systems and fixtures with a focus on quality and durability.
Ensure compliance with building codes and safety standards while completing plumbing tasks.
Deliver exceptional customer service and maintain a positive rapport with clients.
Participate in on-call rotations to handle emergency plumbing situations outside of regular working hours.

education_certification.credential: Certification in Plumbing or related field (e.g., Journeyman or Master Plumber)
